content: knit a cozy patriotic hat to show your support for kamala harris and tim walz perfect for the women s march on november 2 2024 - this hat is not only stylish but also a wonderful way to express your values **this pattern has an accompanying video on youtube ** https //www youtube com/watch v=jyleo0f3-io **youtube channel ** https //www youtube com/@joymacdonell sub_confirmation=1 **we also have zoom craft-along meetings you can join ** september 19th 3 september 23rd 4 october 6th 5 october 19th 6 october 29th 7 please join the hats for harris group here on ravelry https //www ravelry com/groups/hats-for-harris if you are looking for recommendations for yarn substitutions for the icewear wool here are some good choices cascade 220 8 berroco vintage dk 9 sandnes garn double sunday 10 you will need about 90 - 100 yards of each color 1 https //us06web zoom us/meeting/register/tzisdeuorzmvetam7-ijn1ur1bygdccjpx4b 2 https //us06web zoom us/meeting/register/tzuqducvrjmjhdq_6kmhsy8gusmbwgpqo_ao 3 https //us06web zoom us/meeting/register/tzisc-mhqt0ue9k7yjfbp4gag09drrts6mpk 4 https //us06web zoom us/meeting/register/tzcrf-qtqdgoe9e5kzw03dkmhbtrc7qfb7hm 5 https //us06web zoom us/meeting/register/tzatdo-oqzgphdzy6tlimrio1msux7n32g0m 6 https //us06web zoom us/meeting/register/tzmsf-qvrzijhtz8yizwrw2ss5gdxv0qy6ar 7 https //us06web zoom us/meeting/register/tz0ufuiopjwvhddqyshbzwwhbogxaastcsgx 8 https //www yarn com/products/cascade-yarns-220-superwash 9 https //www yarn com/products/berroco-vintage-dk 10 https //www sandnes-garn com/find-store lat=38 716111&lng=-79 311148&zoom=3 47
